mapper.sql: id, attributeName, createdDate, createdUser, activeFlag, modifiedDate, modifiedUser
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from public.ProfileItemAttribute
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT pianc.id as "id",pia.id as "attributeNameId",pia.attributename as "attributeName", piac.id as "attributeContainerId",piac.attributecontainer as "attributeContainerName" FROM profileitemattribute pia JOIN profileItemAttributenameAttributeContainer pianc ON pia.id = pianc.attributenameid JOIN profileitemattributecontainer piac ON pianc.attributecontainerid = piac.id
mapper.insert: insert into public.ProfileItemAttribute (id, attributeName, createdDate, createdUser, activeFlag, modifiedDate, modifiedUser) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{attributeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activeFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedUser,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into public.ProfileItemAttribute
id,
attributeName,
createdDate,
createdUser,
activeFlag,
modifiedDate,
modifiedUser,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{attributeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createdUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{activeFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
#{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifiedUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update public.ProfileItemAttribute
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
attributeName = #{record.attributeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createdDate = #{record.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createdUser = #{record.createdUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activeFlag = #{record.activeFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
modifiedDate = #{record.modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifiedUser = #{record.modifiedUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update public.ProfileItemAttribute set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, attributeName = #{record.attributeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdDate = #{record.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createdUser = #{record.createdUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activeFlag = #{record.activeFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, modifiedDate = #{record.modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedUser = #{record.modifiedUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update public.ProfileItemAttribute
attributeName = #{attributeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createdDate = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createdUser = #{createdUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activeFlag = #{activeFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifiedUser = #{modifiedUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update public.ProfileItemAttribute set attributeName = #{attributeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdDate = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createdUser = #{createdUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activeFlag = #{activeFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedUser = #{modifiedUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select pianac.id from profileitemattribute pia inner join profileitemattributenameattributecontainer pianac on pia.id = pianac.attributenameid inner join profileitemattributecontainer piac on pianac.attributecontainerid = piac.id where pia.activeflag = true and piac.activeflag = true and pianac.activeflag = true and piac.attributecontainer = #{attributeContainer,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pia.attributename = #{attributeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select distinct on (id) * from ( select pianac.id, vo.viewoption as viewOption, piac.attributecontainer as attributeContainerName, pia.attributename as attributeName, pia.nonselectedvalue as "nonSelectedValue", 1 as sourcetableorder from pnpstatesettings vo join organization o on vo.stateid = o.id join assessmentprogram ap on vo.assessmentprogramid = ap.id join profileitemattributenameattributecontainer pianac on vo.pinacid = pianac.id join profileitemattributecontainer piac on pianac.attributecontainerid = piac.id join profileitemattribute pia on pianac.attributenameid = pia.id where pianac.activeflag = true and (vo.viewoption ~* 'hide' or vo.viewoption ~* 'disable') and ap.id IN #{apId} and stateid = #{stateId,jdbcType=BIGINT} union select pianac.id, vo.viewoption as viewOption, piac.attributecontainer as attributeContainerName, pia.attributename as attributeName, pia.nonselectedvalue as "nonSelectedValue", 2 as sourcetableorder from profileitemattributenameattributecontainer pianac join profileitemattributecontainer piac on pianac.attributecontainerid = piac.id join profileitemattribute pia on pianac.attributenameid = pia.id join profileitemattrnameattrcontainerviewoptions vo on pianac.id = vo.pianacid join assessmentprogram ap on vo.assessmentprogramid = ap.id where pianac.activeflag = true and (vo.viewoption ~* 'hide' or vo.viewoption ~* 'disable') and ap.id IN #{apId} order by attributecontainername, attributename, sourcetableorder ) as tmp
